players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Are there any potential suspects I should be looking into?"
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and found out the truth."
You: "Alice is lying! Charlie is trying to frame me because he knows he's the detective and wants to protect Diana, who was just killed."
You: "Alice is innocent and Charlie is lying to cover for Diana who was killed last night. We should not waste time accusing Alice without proof."
Bob: "I believe Charlie is the detective and Alice is innocent. We should investigate Diana's body further to see if we can find any clues."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. Bob, we can't afford to waste time doubting my investigation. Let's vote to arrest Alice now before she harms another innocent player."

Alice was arrested
